forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers this morning, then variable cloudiness during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High near 15C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers during the morning, then variable clouds this afternoon with more showers possible. High 58F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 13C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 56F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. SE winds at 15 to 30 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 53F. SE winds at 10 to 20 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High around 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 59F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
